title: ini inda vAzhvil
sahitya:
ini inda vAzhvil iDarEdum uNDO enadayyan ALAi idu vELai vandEn


anupallavi

  manadin kaiyALAi matiyinri vegunAL vinai kOTi sheidE migha nondu pOnEn


caraNam    sheyalenbadin mEl shivayOgi sheyalE shiriyEnuk-kadilOr porai enbadillai 
kayalanna kaNNAL ayal ninru kANa gati mAri Adum pati tannaik-kaNDEn
